content.webTitle: Indian firm available to answer the call in Ulster

fields.headline: Indian firm available to answer the call in Ulster
fields.bodyText: An Indian company is to create 1,000 jobs in Northern Ireland. ICICI OneSource, one of India's largest business processing outsourcing companies, will set up two contact centres, the first in Belfast, in the next two years. "Northern Ireland is clearly the most competitive near-shore option for companies seeking a base to service western European markets," said Peter Hain, the Northern Ireland secretary, announcing the move yesterday. ICICI OneSource is the first India-based BPO company to invest directly in Northern Ireland and the second investment to result from his trade mission in April, he said.
